short_description: UPGRADED RETINOL & HERBAL EXTRACT - Achieve radiant skin with this new version of retinol & exclusive molecular technology! This skin renewing retinol facial serum quickly sinks into the skin to activate cell turnover. With herb & plant extracts such as Witch hazel, and Aloe vera, your skin is provided with great nutrients for cell regrowth. Provitamin B5, Niacinamide(Vitamin B3), Peptide Serum, Vitamin C & E, and sodium hyaluronate protect your skin cells from free radical damage, for effective antioxidants and anti-aging.

VISIBLY REDUCE WRINKLES IN 4 WEEKS - Proven in trials by dermatologists and our customers, facial lines and wrinkles can be visibly reduced after only 4-8 weeks, leaving your skin refreshed and rejuvenated! +1HEROLABS retinol wrinkle serum is the top choice of retinol anti-aging fans. Based on the exclusive Retinol formula with Provitamin B5 added, this serum has great SOD activity, significantly delays cellular aging, promotes collagen production, and achieves visible wrinkle smoothing.

GLOWING SKIN WITHOUT SPOTS & DULLNESS - Whether you're looking for a solution for dark spots, sunspots, pregnancy marks, or other acquired skin blemishes, we have a spot-correcting formula that's right for you! Gentle retinol for sensitive skin. Our retinol serum has premium retinol and vitamin c, which work in perfect harmony to improve natural exfoliation and block hyperpigmentation.

NIGHT SERUM HERO FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - This night serum is suitable for oily, dry, combination, light and dark skin. After cleansing at night, lightly cover your neck and face with the B5 retinol serum and let it absorb for 1 minute before applying other skin creams. This mild night serum moisturizes and conditions the skin while you sleep, helping to brighten, smooth, and rejuvenate tired skin. Important Tip: Apply sunscreen daily when using retinol in a skincare routine.

ANTI-AGING INNOVATION YOU CAN TRUST - Our B5 Retinol Serum was developed by experienced team of experts and technicians in skincare field, and recognized by dermatologists and leaders in the beauty industry for their incredible effectiveness. Based on consumers' test, 90%+ says their skin felt softer, suppler and brighter. If you have any questions or problems with our products, you can contact us through the storefront, email, official website, and we will reply ASAP, within 24 hours.

short_description: Encapsulation Advantage: Traditional retinol serums can overwhelm your skin. Our 1% encapsulated retinol is protected in a delivery system that releases slowly over time, so you get results without the irritation.

Multi-Targeted Anti Aging & Barrier Support: Our night serum goes beyond just wrinkles and includes peptides, resveratrol, and ceramides to firm skin, boost elasticity, plus antioxidants for a lifted, resilient complexion.

Fortify, Soothe & Hydrate: A powerful trio works in synergy. Ceramides strengthen the skin barrier against retinol irritation, Cica calms redness, and Hyaluronic Acid provides deep hydration for a comfortable, supple feel.

Potent Yet Gentle Formula: Slow-release retinol provides powerful results without irritation. This lightweight gel absorbs instantly and layers perfectly under makeup, ideal for new retinol users or those with sensitive skin.
Preserve Potency to the Last Drop: Unlike dropper bottles our airless pump protects against oxidation, ensuring purity, and stability from first use to finish. Korean skincare formulated

Red Light Therapy Synergy: Although our anti aging serum is strong on its own but when combined with red light it boosts the serums absorption and overall collagen production for a brighter, firmer and younger-looking skin

name: Retinol Serum for Face, Anti Aging & Anti Wrinkle B5 Resurfacing Retinol Serum with Niacinamide, Collagen & Hyaluronic Acid, Smooths Wrinkles & Fine Lines, Dark Spot Corrector, Brighten Dullness
short_description: Triple Retinol Anti-Aging Matrix: With high-purity Crystalline Retinol, high-efficiency HPR, and sustained-release retinol propionate, it delivers long-lasting and gentle anti-aging effects to the skin. As proven by dermatologists and our customers' trials, it takes only 4 to 8 weeks to significantly reduce fine lines and wrinkles on the face.

Anti-Wrinkle Serum: This facial serum is formulated with retinol to improve skin texture and visibly reduce fine lines. The wrinkle-reducing formula contains hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture for intense hydration, while niacinamide works to combat signs of aging and diminish wrinkles. Collagen synergizes with retinol to firm facial contours, enhance skin elasticity, and refine skin’s surface for a smoother, more lifted appearance.

Advanced Retinol Formula: Our Retinol Facial Serum combines eight botanical extracts: Purslane Extract, Gentian Extract, Chamomile Extract, Geranium, Peppermint, Aloe Vera, Sophora Flavescens, and Cactus Extract. This synergistic blend of pure natural botanicals works to soothe skin irritation, reduce redness, and restore the skin barrier’s integrity for healthier-looking complexion.

For All Skin Types: Our Retinol Serum is formulated for skin experiencing loss of firmness, dryness, oiliness, and sensitivity. After cleansing at night, gently apply the Retinol Serum to face and neck. Allow 1 minute for absorption before applying other moisturizers. Important Tip: Apply sunscreen daily when using retinol in a skincare routine.

YouthVibe Standard: All YouthVibe products feature skin-friendly ingredients that effectively soothe skin irritation. Hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested, and not tested on animals. Consumer testing shows over 90% of users report their skin feels softer, more elastic, and more radiant. The product contains Retinol within Health Canada cosmetic limits

According to Health Canada cosmetic limits The maximum concentration of retinol (CAS: 68-26-8) is 1.00%. In our product, the concentration of retinol (CAS: 68-26-8) is 0.003%, which fully complies with Canadian regulations.
